Summary: There was triangle made of 3 dots with orbs surrounding it
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my car riding out in the country when I saw three dots manifest. They were in a triangle shape. Then several smaller orbs manifested and started to fly around it. The main craft was stationary with the other crafts orbiting it for about two minutes before taking off at lightning speed. It did not scare me because I am a paranormal investigator and have witnessed UFOs before.
